text: `NiftiMasker.transform_imgs` allows setting `n_jobs`. This should also be the case for `Niftimasker.inverse_transform`
title: NiftiMasker.inverse_transform should allow multiprocessing

text: Actually, `transform_imgs` should not be available in NiftiMasker since it is a MultiNiftiMasker function. The behavior of both transform and inverse_transform for these functions is subject to debate.
There might be advantageous scenarios in which `NiftiMasker.transform` might profit from (embarrasing) parallelization.
